function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential dissemination of inaccurate or misleading information about COVID-19 due to the use of semi-autonomous systems and telehealth care.","Impact":"Could lead to incorrect treatment recommendations, delayed intervention, and increased spread of the disease.","Mitigation":"Ensure the accuracy and reliability of the data-driven ontology-based intelligence used in the semi-autonomous systems. Implement strict verification processes for treatment recommendations.","Technologies":"Artificial intelligence for data analysis and decision-making, blockchain for data verification and immutability.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, public health authorities.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology developers, regulatory authorities."}]}
